instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Name: Mobius Plug-in UI Library Bundle-Version: 1.0.0 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.ui.ide,org.eclipse.ui.console,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.jdt.core,org.eclipse.jface.text,org.eclipse.debug.core Export-Package: pluginlib; uses:="org.eclipse.jdt.core, org.eclipse.jface.viewers, org.eclipse.debug.core.sourcelookup.containers, org.eclipse.ui.dialogs, org.eclipse.ui.console, org.eclipse.core.resources, org.eclipse.ui, org.eclipse.jface.preference, org.eclipse.jface.resource, org.eclipse.swt.widgets, org.eclipse.core.runtime" Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: J2SE-1.4 Bundle-SymbolicName: mobius.pluginlib;singleton:=true Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Vendor: David Cok and EU Mobius Partners

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Export-Package: escjava,escjava.ant,escjava.ast,escjava.backpred,escjava.completeness,escjava.dfa.buildcfd,escjava.dfa.cfd,escjava.dfa.daganalysis,escjava.gui,escjava.pa,escjava.pa.generic,escjava.parser,escjava.plugin,escjava.prover,escjava.prover.jniw,escjava.reader,escjava.sortedProver,escjava.sortedProver.auflia,escjava.sortedProver.cvc,escjava.sortedProver.fx7,escjava.sortedProver.fx7pg,escjava.sortedProver.simplify,escjava.sortedProver.trew,escjava.sortedProver.z3,escjava.soundness,escjava.sp,escjava.tc,escjava.translate,escjava.vcGeneration,escjava.vcGeneration.coq,escjava.vcGeneration.coq.visitor,escjava.vcGeneration.coq.visitor.simplifiers,escjava.vcGeneration.cvc3,escjava.vcGeneration.pvs,escjava.vcGeneration.sammy,escjava.vcGeneration.simplify,escjava.vcGeneration.xml,javafe,javafe.ast,javafe.decsrc,javafe.filespace,javafe.genericfile,javafe.parser,javafe.parser.test,javafe.reader,javafe.tc,javafe.test,javafe.test.lex,javafe.util,junitutils,org.apache.bcel,org.apache.bcel.classfile,org.apache.bcel.generic,org.apache.bcel.util,org.apache.bcel.verifier,org.apache.bcel.verifier.exc,org.apache.bcel.verifier.statics,org.apache.bcel.verifier.structurals,tohtml Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: J2SE-1.4 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.ui.ide,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.jdt.core,org.eclipse.jface.text,org.eclipse.debug.core,mobius.escjava2.esctools;bundle-version="2.0.8";visibility:=reexport,mobius.pluginlib;bundle-version="1.0.0",org.eclipse.ui.editors,mobius.simplify.plugin;bundle-version="1.5.6" Bundle-Activator: escjava.plugin.EscjavaPlugin Bundle-Name: ESCJava2 plug-in Bundle-Version: 2.0.8 Bundle-Vendor: David R. Cok and EU MOBIUS IST-15905 Project Bundle-SymbolicName: mobius.escjava2.plugin;singleton:=true Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-ClassPath: escsrc/,bin/
